file.name: ChannelActivityHistory.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Channel Activity History
  description: This service domains consolidates and captures customer channel usage activity to support channel activity analysis and also can be referenced for customer access authorization and routing decisions
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/ChannelActivityHistory/10.0.0
paths:
  /ChannelActivityHistory/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - ChannelActivityLog
      summary: InCR Initiate channel activity logging for a customer
      description: InCR Initiate channel activity logging for a customer
      operationId: Initiate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/ChannelActivityLog'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateChannelActivityLogResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ChannelActivityHistory/{channelactivityhistoryId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - ChannelActivityLog
      summary: UpCR Update channel activity logging details for a customer
      description: UpCR Update channel activity logging details for a customer
      operationId: Update
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ChannelActivityHistoryID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/ChannelActivityLog'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ChannelActivityLog'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ChannelActivityHistory/{channelactivityhistoryId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - CR - ChannelActivityLog
      summary: ReCR Retrieve details about customer channel activity logging
      description: ReCR Retrieve details about customer channel activity logging
      operationId: Retrieve
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ChannelActivityHistoryID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ChannelActivityLog'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ChannelActivityHistory/{channelactivityhistoryId}/Event/{eventId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Event
      summary: UpBQ Update a logged event for a customer
      description: UpBQ Update a logged event for a customer
      operationId: UpdateEvent
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ChannelActivityHistoryID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/EventID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdateEventRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateEventResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ChannelActivityHistory/{channelactivityhistoryId}/Event/{eventId}/Capture:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Event
      summary: CaBQ Capture a channel access event in the log
      description: CaBQ Capture a channel access event in the log
      operationId: CaptureEvent
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ChannelActivityHistoryID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/EventID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CaptureEventRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
                example: true
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ChannelActivityHistory/{channelactivityhistoryId}/Event/{eventId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Event
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about a logged channel activity event
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about a logged channel activity event
      operationId: RetrieveEvent
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ChannelActivityHistoryID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/EventID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveEventResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
components:
  schemas:
    ChannelActivityLog:
      type: object
      properties:
        CustomerReference:
          type: object
        Date:
          type: string
    Event:
      type: object
      properties:
        EmployeeReference:
          type: object
        ProductReference:
          type: object
        ProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        CustomerContactRecordReference:
          type: object
        CustomerContactRecord:
          type: string
        CustomerContactRecordCustomerReference:
          type: object
        CustomerContactRecordContactDevice:
          type: string
        CustomerContactRecordAuthenticationStatus:
          type: string
        CustomerContactRecordRoutingSelectionStatus:
          type: string
        CustomerContactRecordMenuSelection:
          type: string
        CustomerContactRecordServicingRequest:
          type: string
        CustomerContactRecordServicingEventHistory:
          type: string
        CustomerContactRecordServicingPositionReference:
          type: object
        CustomerContactRecordServicingResourceReference:
          type: object
        CustomerContactRecordActivityRecord:
          type: string
        CustomerSessionDialogueReference:
          type: object
        CustomerSessionDialogueRecord:
          type: string
        CustomerContactRecordDuration:
          type: string
        CustomerContactActivityRecord:
          type: string
        CustomerContactResult:
          type: string
        ChannelActivityHistoryReportReference:
          type: object
        ChannelActivityHistoryReportFrom/to:
          type: string
        ChannelActivityHistoryReport:
          type: string
        TransactionAuthorizationResult:
          type: string
    HTTPError:
      type: object
      properties:
        status_code:

        status:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
    InitiateChannelActivityLogResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        ChannelActivityLog:
          type: object
          properties:
            Date:
              type: string
    UpdateEventRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        Event:
          type: object
          properties:
            EmployeeReference:
              type: object
            ProductReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordCustomerReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordContactDevice:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordAuthenticationStatus:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordRoutingSelectionStatus:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordMenuSelection:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingRequest:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingEventHistory:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingPositionReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordServicingResourceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordActivityRecord:
              type: string
            CustomerSessionDialogueReference:
              type: object
            CustomerSessionDialogueRecord:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordDuration:
              type: string
            CustomerContactActivityRecord:
              type: string
            CustomerContactResult:
              type: string
            ChannelActivityHistoryReportReference:
              type: object
            ChannelActivityHistoryReportFromOrto:
              type: string
            TransactionAuthorizationResult:
              type: string
    UpdateEventResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        Event:
          type: object
          properties:
            EmployeeReference:
              type: object
            ProductReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordCustomerReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordContactDevice:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordAuthenticationStatus:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordRoutingSelectionStatus:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordMenuSelection:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingRequest:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingEventHistory:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingPositionReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordServicingResourceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordActivityRecord:
              type: string
            CustomerSessionDialogueReference:
              type: object
            CustomerSessionDialogueRecord:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordDuration:
              type: string
            CustomerContactActivityRecord:
              type: string
            CustomerContactResult:
              type: string
            ChannelActivityHistoryReportReference:
              type: object
            ChannelActivityHistoryReportFromOrto:
              type: string
            TransactionAuthorizationResult:
              type: string
    CaptureEventRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        Event:
          type: object
          properties:
            EmployeeReference:
              type: object
            ProductReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordCustomerReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordContactDevice:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordAuthenticationStatus:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordRoutingSelectionStatus:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordMenuSelection:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingRequest:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingEventHistory:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingPositionReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordServicingResourceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordActivityRecord:
              type: string
            CustomerSessionDialogueReference:
              type: object
            CustomerSessionDialogueRecord:
              type: string

              type: string

              type: object

          type: object

          type: object

            EmployeeReference:
              type: object
            ProductReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordCustomerReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordContactDevice:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordAuthenticationStatus:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordRoutingSelectionStatus:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordMenuSelection:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingRequest:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingEventHistory:
              type: string
            CustomerContactRecordServicingPositionReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordServicingResourceReference:
              type: object
            CustomerContactRecordActivityRecord:
              type: string
            CustomerSessionDialogueReference:
              type: object
            CustomerSessionDialogueRecord:
              type: string

      name: channelactivityhistoryId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
    EventID:
      name: eventId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
  requestBodies:

      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ChannelActivityLog'
    UpdateEventRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateEventRequest'
    CaptureEventRequest:

      content:

      description: Unauthorized

    ForbiddenError:

    TooManyRequestsError:

    InternalServerError:
      description: Internal Server Error
      content:

          schema:

...
